Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • biblinkcreator.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    A message logging mechanism.

    Author: David Nazarian

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Logger.MessageCategory
      An enumeration for the category of the printed messages.

      An enumeration for the destination of the printed messages.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Logger

        public Logger(Logger.PrintType printType,
              java.lang.String pathname,
              boolean appendFile)
        Parameters:
        printType - The destination of the printed messages.
        pathname - The path (including the filename) of the file where the messages will be logged.
        appendFile - A value indicating if the file will be appended or created.

    • Method Detail

      • logMessage

        public void logMessage(java.lang.String message,
                       Logger.MessageCategory messageCategory)
        Logs a provided message.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be logged.
        messageCategory - The category of the message to be logged.
